name: TecnoballZ for Windows (T4W)
description:
~: T4W :~

(TecnoballZ for Windows)

//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//

A exciting Brick Breaker with 50 levels of game and 11 special

levels, distributed on the 2 modes of game to give the player a

sophisticated system of attack weapons with an enormous

power of fire that can be build by gaining bonuses.

Numerous decors, musics and sounds complete this great

game. This game was ported from the Commodore Amiga.

Now for Windows!...

//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//_//

TecnoballZ for Windows is the version of the game TecnoballZ

(original from TLK Games) for Windows, this version have a

few modifications to work, compiled with Visual Studio,

you can play the original game under Windows without emulator.

Needs to run


 you can download from here:
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=52685

Please visit original project page:
http://linux.tlk.fr/games/TecnoballZ/

Compatible with Windows 7/10

Binary & sorce code available!

Enjoy!
